text: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ فَهُمۡ فِي رَوۡضَةٖ يُحۡبَرُونَ

translation.en: And as for those who had believed and done righteous deeds, they will be in a garden [of Paradise], delighted
translation.id: Adapun orang-orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan kebajikan, maka mereka di dalam taman (surga) bergembira
